pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for the 'Enigma' 'API' // The company 'Enigma' (http://enigma.io) holds many public 'datasets' from governments, companies, universities, and organizations. 'Enigma' provides an 'API' for data, 'metadata', and statistics on each of the 'datasets'. 'enigma' is a client to interact with the 'Enigma' 'API', including getting the data and 'metadata' for 'datasets' in 'Enigma', as well as collecting statistics on 'datasets'. In addition, you can download a 'gzipped' 'csv' file of a 'dataset' if you want the whole 'dataset'. An 'API' key from 'Enigma' is required to use 'enigma'.
